# policy-safe-knowledge-assistant

All-in-one example composing locale/jurisdiction gate + versioned KB + HITL pipeline + learning hub.

- **Stability**: experimental
- **Owners**: @examples
- **Tags**: assistant, knowledge, policy, hitl, learning
